languages.text: "Вот как?" {n}Маражай наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Тебе настолько хотелось быть подле меня? Настолько ты мечтал{mf||а} о моем внимании и прикосновении? Мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}, сколь трогательное... и бессильное признание".
"Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."
languages.original_text: "Вот как?" {n}Маражай наклоняется к вам.{/n} "Тебе настолько хотелось быть подле меня? Настолько ты мечтал{mf||а} о моем внимании и прикосновении? Мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}, сколь трогательное... и бессильное признание".

traits.locale_text: "Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."
"Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."
"Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."
"Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."

languages.text: “是吗？”{n}玛拉斋倾身靠近你。{/n}“你不是那么渴望与我亲近吗？你不是那么渴望我的关注、我的爱抚吗？我的小宠物啊，多么心酸……多么卑微的告白啊。”
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."

traits.locale_text: “是吗？”{n}玛拉斋倾身靠近你。{/n}“你不是那么渴望与我亲近吗？你不是那么渴望我的关注、我的爱抚吗？我的小宠物啊，多么心酸……多么卑微的告白啊。”

languages.text: «¿No me digas?». {n}Marazhai se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «¿Tan {mf|desesperado|desesperada} estabas por tenerme a tu lado? ¿Tanto ansiabas mi atención, mi contacto? Ah, mascota mía, qué declaración tan conmovedora... y patética».
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."

traits.locale_text: «¿No me digas?». {n}Marazhai se inclina hacia ti.{/n} «¿Tan {mf|desesperado|desesperada} estabas por tenerme a tu lado? ¿Tanto ansiabas mi atención, mi contacto? Ah, mascota mía, qué declaración tan conmovedora... y patética».

languages.text: « Vraiment ? {n}Marazhai s'incline vers vous.{/n} Vous souhaitiez donc si ardemment vous rapprocher de moi ? Vous souhaitiez donc si ardemment que je vous regarde, que je vous touche ? {mf|Mon brave petit|Ma brave petite} esclave... Que voilà une déclaration touchante ! Quel aveu de faiblesse ! »
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? » {n}Marazhai s'incline vers vous.{/n} Vous souhaitiez donc si ardemment vous rapprocher de moi ? Vous souhaitiez donc si ardemment que je vous regarde, que je vous touche ? {mf|Mon brave petit|Ma brave petite} esclave... Que voilà une déclaration touchante ! Quel aveu de faiblesse ! »

languages.text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Marazhai lehnt sich zu dir.{/n} "Wolltet Ihr so sehr in meiner Nähe sein? Habt Ihr Euch so sehr nach meiner Aufmerksamkeit, meiner Berührung gesehnt? {mf|Mein gehorsamer Ergebener|Meine gehorsame Ergebene}, was für ein rührendes Eingeständnis Euer Schwäche."
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Marazhai lehnt sich zu dir.{/n} "Wolltet Ihr so sehr in meiner Nähe sein? Habt Ihr Euch so sehr nach meiner Aufmerksamkeit, meiner Berührung gesehnt? {mf|Mein gehorsamer Ergebener|Meine gehorsame Ergebene}, was für ein rührendes Eingeständnis Euer Schwäche."

languages.text: 「そうなのか？」{n}マラズハイがあなたへと身を乗り出してくる。{/n}「そんなにも俺のそばにいたかったのか？俺からの注目を、俺に触れられることを、そんなにも切望していたのか？俺の可愛いペットよ、何と痛ましい…そして弱々しい告白か」
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."

traits.locale_text: 「そうなのか？」{n}マラズハイがあなたへと身を乗り出してくる。{/n}「そんなにも俺のそばにいたかったのか？俺からの注目を、俺に触れられることを、そんなにも切望していたのか？俺の可愛いペットよ、何と痛ましい…そして弱々しい告白か」

languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."

languages.text: "Öyle mi?" {n}Marazhai sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Yakınımda olmayı bu kadar mı delicesine istedin? İlgimi, dokunuşlarımı bu kadar mı arzuladın? Küçük hayvanım benim, nasıl da dokunaklı... Tatmin etmeyen bir itiraf bu böyle."
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Marazhai leans toward you.{/n} "Did you want so desperately to be near me? Did you so crave my attention, my touch? My little pet, what a poignant... and feeble admission."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi?" {n}Marazhai, sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Yakınımda olmayı bu kadar mı delicesine istedin? İlgimi, dokunuşlarımı bu kadar mı arzuladın? Küçük hayvanım benim, bu nasıl da dokunaklı... Tatmin etmeyen bir itiraf böyle."
